attributes.action: Stop the roll out and use of trusted digital identity services
attributes.additional_details:
We think it infringes on the people's rights and freedom, is all about control and is not acceptable. We think Parliament is there to do what the people require. 

We think the public have not been consulted on this.
attributes.background: We do not want digital identity to be used for any reason and for the Government to stop the roll out of GOV.UK One Login.
